name: Milky Way (Rocket Simp)
description:
Create your own solar system with Milky Way! grow and discover odd little planets and keep them alive in your orbit. Go on quests to find cosmic tier planets, grow moons and build a galactic defense against asteroids 

Milky Way is a casual and surreal planet collector. Your goal is to discover all the planets and score points by collecting rare planets, moons and managing the biggest solar system you can!

Every planet has unique abilities to help them exist in your solar system. Such as Gas Giant who simply likes to eat other planets, or Flow who can speed up time!

Adjust their orbit so they don't collide with other planets. Grow moons in their orbit and harvest the planet's flowers and resources

There are 40 planets to create, merge, hatch or even grow moons into new planets! there are lot of ways to discover them all. Fill out your sticker book by finding  every planet

Buy flowers from the locals, trade planets in the illegal Rock Markets and maybe merge some of them together in the Centrifuge to make super planets. Visit your neighbors to aid your cosmic adventureThis beta is not for a big project. I am just a little guy making a little game. 

Milky Way was previously a mobile game that needed a lot more work. Its transition from mobile to PC has affected it's game play and UI as I have gutted and re-implemented features. 

Feedback for the game and bug reporting will be most appreciated. Feel free to comment them here :)
